This is my Football Sporting Director's Odyssey. Hey there, I'm Federico Ferrero from Italy, a die-hard Torino fan, sales manager and world traveller. But there's one passion that truly sets my soul on fire: football. And not just any football, but the kind that ignites the spirit, transcends boundaries and brings people together. You see, I'm not just a spectator; I'm deeply involved in the world of football as the Sporting Director of Ama Brenta Calcio Ceva, a club from the heart of Piemonte, Italy. ‚öΩ A Season of effort Last Sunday was a momentous occasion for us‚Äîa testament to the resilience and unwavering spirit of our team. The atmosphere in the locker room was nothing short of electric. Amid adversity, we refused to back down. With strategic player changes and sheer determination, we turned the tide and began our ascent from the bottom of the standings. Against all odds, we emerged victorious, losing just three out of fifteen games in 2024‚Äîa testament to our unity and resilience. But behind every triumph lies a story of dedication and hard work. ü§ù Behind the Scenes and ‚öΩ Passion Ignited As the sports director, I navigate the complexities of player contracts, negotiations, and management, ensuring seamless coordination between the team, coaching staff, and executives. Also, one of the most rewarding aspects of my role is discovering hidden talents. Football isn't just a game to me; it's a way of life, a passion that fuels my every endeavor. And I invite you to join me on this journey as we continue to navigate the world of football, one goal at a time. ‚öΩüíº #FootballPassion #TeamTriumph #BehindTheScenes #ScoutingSuccess #GameChanger

Behind the Scenes: Our Culture and Values Workshops While the European Football Championship recently crowned its champion, we at #WeAreMibauStema have been playing our own special game over the past few weeks‚Äînot on the field, but in workshops dedicated to our culture and values. ‚öΩüìù We've been working intensively to develop the best strategies for our collective success, focusing on defining and strengthening our "We Culture." Julian Nagelsmann, coach of the German men's national football team, couldn't have summed up the mission of our #CultureAndValues better in his closing press conference: Let's just do it together! ü§ù Just like a football team, our team is made up of diverse personalities. For a collective to function, everyone must find their role within the group‚Äîthis is true in sports, at work, and in society. Clear communication, necessary compromises, and bold decisions are crucial for us to pursue and achieve our goals together as a team. üíØ A cultural evolution is needed, where the focus is not on individual performance but on togetherness. The "I" becomes "We." Only when we are united in our goals and convictions will our teamwork be strong and our success sustainable. Our integrated value chain of production, logistics and sales plays a key role in this üöÄ üëâ Learn more about our values: https://lnkd.in/dbYJgZsy

üèÖü•àü•â Reflecting on the exhilarating events of the past weekend, I found myself immersed in the world of sports and its profound lessons. As someone who has treaded the competitive path of sales and has experienced the electrifying rush of youth sports, I'm driven to explore the profound wisdom behind celebrating achievements like silver or bronze medals. In my early sales journey, the resounding mantra was clear: Victory was the ultimate prize, and settling for anything less than the gold was unacceptable. However, as the tapestry of time unfolded, I gleaned a broader perspective, one that magnifies the incredible value hidden within the silvers and bronzes. Silver and bronze medals aren't merely tokens of rank; they encapsulate the relentless drive, unyielding resilience, and unparalleled expertise that define champions. They embody the pinnacle of achievement, the zenith of prowess, and the culmination of a journey fraught with relentless dedication and uncountable sacrifices. üèÜüëè Translating this ethos into the dynamic world of sales, I discerned remarkable parallels. While basking in the glory of sealing a monumental deal or surmounting summits is electrifying, there's an equally potent energy in celebrating the incremental victories‚Äînurturing enduring client relationships, forging steadfast forward strides, and ceaselessly refining oneself. These building blocks are the DNA of triumph, collectively constructing the narrative of success. üìàüíº Hence, the question resounds: Should we revel in the glory of second or third place? Undoubtedly, yes. Such celebrations underscore our unyielding commitment, unflagging determination, and the audacious spirit to embrace the journey. They affirm that triumph isn't solely confined to cresting the zenith; it resides in the pursuit, the evolution, and the constant metamorphosis. Our life's canvas is woven with milestones, each deserving recognition and reverence, whether they shine in silver or exude the radiance of gold. Every victory, irrespective of its hue, shapes our narrative, fuels our ambition, and fuels our fervor for the road ahead. Let's ardently embrace the spirit of celebration, a testament to our resilience, our growth, and our unending pursuit of excellence. üåüüéâ #UnyieldingAmbition #TriumphInDiversity #ChasingExcellence #SalesSaga #DefiningMoments #ElevateEveryVictory #EmbarkOnGreatness

The Power of Sportsmanship Last Saturday, I attended the 2024 RBC Canadian Open with my family, eager to watch Rory McIlroy in action. Not only did we see him play, but we also witnessed a friendly moment between him and Tom Kim before teeing off at the 6th hole. This picture (yes, I took it! ‚õ≥Ô∏è) reminded me of the great #sportsmanship demonstrated in the biopharmaceutical industry today. ü§ù Over the past year, I've observed leaders from various pharmaceutical companies increasingly acknowledge and celebrate their competitors' achievements. They commend each other's scientific breakthroughs and the profound impact these have on patients' lives. This collaborative spirit is both refreshing and inspiring. ‚ú® Throughout the day, I saw golf professionals handle wins and losses with grace. They're not on the fairway just to score points but also to learn from others and cheer on everyone's victories and advancements. Whether on the golf course or in the lab, a cooperative mindset pushes us beyond our comfort zones. This attitude is crucial in biopharma, where supporting each other means we all improve - getting better, higher, and faster. üèÖ Real leadership isn't about beating the competition; it's about creating a culture where everyone benefits from shared progress. The spirit of sportsmanship reflects an encouraging shift towards a culture of collaboration in biopharma. By embracing partnerships with public sectors, academia, and patient advocacy groups, we can further advance science to improve patients' lives and ensure that every achievement is a shared victory. Let's create an environment where every win is a win for all. #Collaboration #Leadership #Biopharma

üåçA message to all Coaches ‚ú® From personal experience, I can attest that coming to Spain and witnessing the football culture here has been an eye-opening journey unlike anything else. As a coach, the opportunities for growth and learning are endless. The tactical brilliance, technical prowess, and sheer passion for the game here in Spain have enriched my understanding of football in ways I never thought possible. Observing training sessions, exchanging ideas with experienced coaches, and immersing myself in the Spanish coaching methods have elevated my skills and knowledge as a coach. All the connections I've made during my time in Spain have been invaluable. Networking with coaches, administrators, and scouts from various clubs has not only expanded my professional circle but also opened doors for collaborative projects, career advancements, and the exchange of ideas. Building these connections has had a lasting impact on my coaching journey. But perhaps the most rewarding aspect of being in Spain is witnessing the development and progress of all the players and coaches that have come through our doors. Exposing them to the Spanish football culture has not only improved their technical abilities but has also instilled a deeper passion and love for the game. The experiences they've had and the memories they've made will stay with them for a lifetime. If you're a coach longing for personal and professional growth, I invite you to consider bringing your team to Spain. It's a transformative experience that will broaden your horizons and provide unparalleled opportunities for learning and development. ‚öΩ

üåü Embrace Competition: Driving Evolution in Sports and Life! üèÜ Let's take a moment to appreciate the incredible power of competition and how it fuels our growth and evolution. Whether it's in sports or in life, challenging ourselves through healthy competition is the key to unlocking our full potential. üå± In the realm of sports, competition pushes athletes to constantly raise the bar. When we face formidable opponents, we are motivated to train harder, sharpen our skills, and explore new strategies. In this process, we not only enhance our physical abilities but also develop mental resilience, perseverance, and teamwork. The pursuit of victory drives us to go beyond our limits, resulting in astonishing achievements and breakthroughs. üèÖ But competition is not limited to sports; it extends to various aspects of our lives. In our personal and professional journeys, challenging ourselves is vital for growth. When we push ourselves outside our comfort zones, take on new challenges, and face adversity head-on, we cultivate resilience, adaptability, and innovation. By constantly striving to improve, we become better versions of ourselves, achieving goals we once thought were unattainable. üåü Remember, competition is not about tearing each other down, but rather about uplifting one another through the pursuit of excellence. It's about inspiring and being inspired, learning from our competitors, and fostering a culture of mutual growth. Together, we push the boundaries of what is possible and drive the evolution of sports and life. üåç So, let's celebrate competition as a driving force for evolution! Embrace challenges, seek out new opportunities, and never stop pushing yourself. The journey might be tough, but the rewards are immeasurable. üåü #CompetitionDrivesEvolution #ChallengeYourself #UnleashYourPotential #PushingBoundaries #PopsCulture

With the Ryder Cup now in full swing ‚õ≥ üèÜ , it's set to become the biggest 'business success' of 2023 for the game of golf. Much of the success will be attributed to the approach in partnership strategy and global communications, which further reiterates the importance for all corporate companies to learn and adapt to. I've listed some key takeaways from this article written by Josh Carpenter as to how this is being achieved. - Partnership Activation: Leveraging effective global communication strategies enables sponsors to activate their partnerships on a global scale and into foreign markets. This added value will attract new sponsorship and investment into the game, enhancing future growth. - Fan Engagement/Recognition: Consumers grow the game, plain and simple. By utilizing global partners, the chances of reaching new audiences through various mediums increases the likelihood of new viewership and support. Utilizing the diversity of brands can allow for broader accomodation and appeal for fans on the a global scale. Ex; Hilton "Stay on the Green Initiative" - Global Partnerships: Permits easier expansion into foreign markets when associated with a global event such as the Ryder Cup. - Brand Awareness: Companies such as Capgemini are leveraging the event to expand its presence into the U.S market. #RyderCup #GlobalPartnerships #Golf PGA TOUR Sports Business Journal Aon BMW Group Capgemini Citi DP World Hilton ROLEX The Ryder Cup
